item.description:
Do you love French language and culture? Parlons francais ensemble.
Cette semaine nous allons parler de .... c'est une surprise!

Il y a beaucoup de gens who would like to parler avec vous! Venez prendre un caf√© ou patisserie chez Panera. Look for the table with the Tour Eiffel!!
We meet the 2nd and 4th Wednesday of each month at 7PM. If you arrive punctually and there is onbody there, just wait a few minutes- some of us travel long distances or work late. Not everyone RSVP's, so there are usually many more people than shown here.
Bienvenue! et a bientot!

group.name: The West Hartford Groupe de French

item.name: The West Hartford Groupe de French December Meetup
